name: 2024 17th International Conference on Machine Vision
content: Conference Proceedings: Accepted and presented papers of ICMV 2024 will be published by SPIE, to be included in SPIE Digital Library, provided to the Web of Science Conference Proceedings Citation Index-Science, Scopus, Ei Compendex, etc, to ensure maximum awareness of the Proceedings.
organizers: University of Stuttgart, Germany, Russian-Armenian University, Armenia
